verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֖ית <S%H7225><s%> be-re-Shit In the beginning בָּרָ֣א <S%H1254><s%> ba-Ra created אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; God אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim the heaven וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz, And the earth הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah was תֹ֙הוּ֙ <S%H8414><s%> to-hu without form וָבֹ֔הוּ <S%H922><s%> va-Vo-hu, and void וְחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ve-Cho-shech and darkness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei [was] upon the face תְה֑וֹם <S%H8415><s%> te-Hom; of the deep וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach And the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God מְרַחֶ֖פֶת <S%H7363><s%> me-ra-Che-fet moved עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the face הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim. of the waters

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God יְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi Let there be א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> or; light וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and there was אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> or. and there was light

וַיַּ֧רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָא֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> ha-'Or the light כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov; [it was] good וַיַּבְדֵּ֣ל <S%H914><s%> vai-yav-Del separated אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, and God בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein from הָא֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> ha-'Or the light וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein from הַחֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> ha-Cho-shech. the darkness

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God לָאוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> la-'Or the light י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, Day וְלַחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ve-la-Cho-shech and the darkness קָ֣רָא <S%H7121><s%> Ka-ra he called לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lai-lah; Night וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> 'E-rev And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Vo-ker and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. were the first פ Peh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi Let there be רָקִ֖יעַ <S%H7549><s%> ra-Ki-a' Let there be a firmament בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim; of the waters וִיהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vi-Hi become מַבְדִּ֔יל <S%H914><s%> mav-Dil, and let it divide בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein among מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim the waters לָמָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> la-Ma-yim. from the waters

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as made אֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָרָקִיעַ֒ <S%H7549><s%> ha-ra-ki-a' the firmament וַיַּבְדֵּ֗ל <S%H914><s%> vai-yav-Del, and divided בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> bein among הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim the waters אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat [were] under לָרָקִ֔יעַ <S%H7549><s%> la-ra-Ki-a', the firmament וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein from הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim, from the waters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al [were] above לָרָקִ֑יעַ <S%H7549><s%> la-ra-Ki-a'; the firmament וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> Chen. and it was so

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God לָֽרָקִ֖יעַ <S%H7549><s%> la-ra-Ki-a' the firmament שָׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim; Heaven וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> 'E-rev And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Vo-ker and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day שֵׁנִֽי׃ <S%H8145><s%> she-Ni. were the second פ Peh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God יִקָּו֨וּ <S%H6960><s%> yik-ka-Vu be gathered together הַמַּ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim Let the waters מִתַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat Thahash הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim under the heaven אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> El- unto מָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom place אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one וְתֵרָאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-te-ra-'Eh [land] appear הַיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <S%H3004><s%> hai-yab-ba-Shah; and let the dry וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> Chen. so

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God לַיַּבָּשָׁה֙ <S%H3004><s%> lai-yab-ba-Shah the dry אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, [land] Earth וּלְמִקְוֵ֥ה <S%H4723><s%> u-le-mik-Veh and the gathering together הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim of the waters קָרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra called יַמִּ֑ים <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim; he Seas וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> Tov. that [it was] good

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God תַּֽדְשֵׁ֤א <S%H1876><s%> tad-She bring forth הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz Let the earth דֶּ֔שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> De-she, grass עֵ֚שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> 'E-sev the herb מַזְרִ֣יעַ <S%H2232><s%> maz-Ri-a' yielding זֶ֔רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra', seed עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz tree פְּרִ֞י <S%H6529><s%> pe-Ri [and] the fruit עֹ֤שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'O-seh yielding פְּרִי֙ <S%H6529><s%> pe-Ri fruit לְמִינ֔וֹ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-No, after his kind אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose זַרְעוֹ־ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'ov- seed ב֖וֹ vo עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; [is] in itself upon the earth וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> Chen. so

וַתּוֹצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> vat-to-Tze brought forth הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz And the earth דֶּ֠שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> De-she grass עֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> 'E-sev [and] herb מַזְרִ֤יעַ <S%H2232><s%> maz-Ri-a' yielding זֶ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> ze-ra' seed לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Ne-hu, after his kind וְעֵ֧ץ <S%H6086><s%> ve-'Etz and the tree עֹֽשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-seh- yielding פְּרִ֛י <S%H6529><s%> pe-Ri fruit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher with זַרְעוֹ־ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'ov- whose seed ב֖וֹ vo לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Ne-hu; [was] in itself after his kind וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> Tov. that [it was] good

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> 'E-rev And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Vo-ker and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day שְׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> she-li-Shi. were the third פ Peh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi become מְאֹרֹת֙ <S%H3974><s%> me-'o-Rot Let there be lights בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <S%H7549><s%> bir-Ki-a' in the firmament הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of the heaven לְהַבְדִּ֕יל <S%H914><s%> le-hav-Dil to divide בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein among הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom the day וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein from הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-La-ye-lah; from the night וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu them be for לְאֹתֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> le-'o-Tot and let them be for signs וּלְמ֣וֹעֲדִ֔ים <S%H4150><s%> u-le-Mo-'a-Dim, and for seasons וּלְיָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> u-le-ya-Mim and for days וְשָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> ve-sha-Nim. and years

וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu them be for לִמְאוֹרֹת֙ <S%H3974><s%> lim-'o-Rot And let them be for lights בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <S%H7549><s%> bir-Ki-a' in the firmament הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of the heaven לְהָאִ֖יר <S%H215><s%> le-ha-'Ir to give light עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; upon the earth וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> Chen. so

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as made אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei two הַמְּאֹרֹ֖ת <S%H3974><s%> ham-me-'o-Rot lights הַגְּדֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lim; great אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמָּא֤וֹר <S%H3974><s%> ham-ma-'or light הַגָּדֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol the greater לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <S%H4475><s%> le-mem-She-let to rule הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, the day וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמָּא֤וֹר <S%H3974><s%> ham-ma-'or light הַקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> hak-ka-Ton and the lesser לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <S%H4475><s%> le-mem-She-let to rule הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah, the night וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכּוֹכָבִֽים׃ <S%H3556><s%> hak-ko-cha-Vim. [he made] the stars

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten set אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <S%H7549><s%> bir-Ki-a' them in the firmament הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of the heaven לְהָאִ֖יר <S%H215><s%> le-ha-'Ir to give light עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. upon the earth

וְלִמְשֹׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> ve-lim-Shol And to rule בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom over the day וּבַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> u-val-Lay-lah, and over the night וּֽלֲהַבְדִּ֔יל <S%H914><s%> u-la-hav-Dil, and to divide בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein among הָא֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> ha-'Or the light וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein from הַחֹ֑שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ha-Cho-shech; from the darkness וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> Tov. that [it was] good

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> 'E-rev And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Vo-ker and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day רְבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> re-vi-'I. were the fourth פ Peh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God יִשְׁרְצ֣וּ <S%H8317><s%> yish-re-Tzu bring forth abundantly הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim, Let the waters שֶׁ֖רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> She-retz the moving creature נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh that hath חַיָּ֑ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah; life וְעוֹף֙ <S%H5775><s%> ve-'Of and fowl יְעוֹפֵ֣ף <S%H5774><s%> ye-'o-Fef [that] may fly עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei in the open רְקִ֥יעַ <S%H7549><s%> re-Ki-a' firmament הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. of heaven

וַיִּבְרָ֣א <S%H1254><s%> vai-yiv-Ra created אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַתַּנִּינִ֖ם <S%H8577><s%> hat-tan-ni-Nim whales הַגְּדֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lim; great וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh creature הַֽחַיָּ֣ה׀ <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yah and every living הָֽרֹמֶ֡שֶׂת <S%H7430><s%> ha-ro-Me-set that moveth אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which שָׁרְצ֨וּ <S%H8317><s%> sha-re-Tzu brought forth abundantly הַמַּ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim which the waters לְמִֽינֵהֶ֗ם <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-ne-Hem, after their kind וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every ע֤וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of fowl כָּנָף֙ <S%H3671><s%> ka-Naf and every winged לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Ne-hu, after his kind וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> Tov. that [it was] good
